getTop().Description: Returns the top edge of the window, in pixels, relative to the top edge of the screen.

getHeight().Description: Returns the total height of the window in pixels.

getWidth().Description: Returns the total width of the window in pixels.

getRootViewNode().Description: Returns the @B_android#app#assist#AssistStructure#ViewNode_E@ containing the root content of the window.

getLeft().Description: Returns the left edge of the window, in pixels, relative to the left edge of the screen.

getTitle().Description: Returns the title associated with the window, if it has one.

getDisplayId().Description: Returns the ID of the display this window is on, for use with @B_android#hardware#display#DisplayManager#getDisplay_E@.

ClassDesc: Describes a window in the assist data.
